content.title: Coir Udyami Yojana
content.department: Ministry Of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises
content.beneficiary: Individuals, Companies, Self Help Groups, NGOs, Institutions registered under Societies Registration Act 1860, Production Co-operative Societies, Joint Liability Groups and Charitable Trust
content.details: Coir Udyami Yojana is a credit linked subsidy scheme for setting up of coir units with project cost up to Rs.10 lakhs plus one cycle of working capital, which shall not exceed 25% of the project cost. Working capital will not be considered for subsidy. The scheme is administered by the Ministry of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises and implemented by Coir Board.
benefits: Maximum admissible cost of the project is Rs.10 lakhs plus working capital.
eligibility: Any individual above 18 years of age with Indian Citizenship.
No income ceiling for assistance for setting up of project under Coir Udyami Yojana.
Assistance is available for projects for the production of coir fibre/yarn/products etc.
Assistance will be made available to various entities including individuals, companies, and NGOs.
Project cost includes capital expenditure i.e., Building and Machinery.
Working capital included in the project shall not exceed more than 25% of the project cost.
exclusions: Units that have already availed Govt. subsidy under any other Scheme for the same purpose are not eligible.
Working capital will not be considered for subsidy.
Cases of inflated costing on machinery/building will not be allowed.
content.application_process: Applicants have to visit the official portal, click on 'Apply Now', log in or register, provide required details and documents, and submit.
documents_required: Prescribed Application Form for Scheme assistance
Copy of Title Deed of the property
Proof of training availed from Coir Board
Machineries proposed to be purchased along with Invoice
Industrial Establishment Certificate issued by DIC
Plan & Estimate for construction of workshed certified by Chartered Engineer
Project Profile of the proposed project
In case of SC/ST, copy of Caste Certificate
